long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture, annotate, and share design feedback with our intuitive browser plugin. Perfect for designers looking to streamline the review process, this tool allows you to inspect elements on any live webpage, write detailed feedback, and copy annotated screenshots directly to your clipboard. No need for endless back-and-forths—just clear, concise feedback that you can instantly share with your development team. Improve collaboration and keep your design vision intact, all with a simple browser extension.
